reviewText: Very good instruction for those new to the doubles game

The USPS, lost my original purchase of this Todd Bender DVD. Richard at Sunrise Production went way beyond the call of duty to get me a replacement DVD and, provided me with an additional DVD, at no extra cost. This time, the USPS managed to get things to me on time!

Thank you so much, Richard for taking such good care of me. You did a fantastic job!
If you're serious about skeet doubles then this is the only DVD you need.
Bought the DVD as a christmas gift. He loved the movie and is still watching it. Would tell anyone if you are into skeet shooting order it for someone.
